程序包 uestc.zhanghanwen.ATTCK.Repositories

接口 NodeRepository<GN extends GraphNode>

类型参数:
GN - inheritance of GraphNode
所有超级接口:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<GN,String>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<GN,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<GN,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<GN>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<GN,String>
所有已知子接口:
GroupRepo, MatrixRepo, MitigationRepo, SoftwareRepo, TacticRepo, TechniqueRepo
@Repository public interface NodeRepository<GN extends GraphNode> extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<GN,String>
The Neo4jRepository interface of cypher queries.
For different types of node, each one can inherit to create its own repository.
版本:
1.0
作者:
zhanghanwen
另请参阅:
  • Neo4jRepository
  • GraphNode

    从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

    count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteAllById, deleteById, existsById, findById, save

    从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository

    findAll, findAll, findAll, findAll, findAllById, saveAll

    从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository

    findAll

    从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor

    count, exists, findAll, findBy, findOne

  • 方法详细资料

    • findByName

      @Query("MATCH (m) WHERE m.name=$name RETURN m;") List<GN> findByName(@Param("name") String name) throws Exception
      query object by name from database
      参数:
      name - name
      返回:
      List of queried objects
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • findByMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m) WHERE m.mitre_id=$id RETURN m;") List<GN> findByMitreId(@Param("id") String id) throws Exception
      query object by id from database
      参数:
      id - id
      返回:
      List of queried objects
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • findRelatedByStartNodeMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m)-[r]->(n) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 RETURN n;") <EN extends GraphNode> List<EN> findRelatedByStartNodeMitreId(@Param("m1") String mitreId) throws Exception
      query all related objects from database
      类型参数:
      EN - instance of GraphNode
      参数:
      mitreId - id
      返回:
      List of queried objects
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • findRelationshipByMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m)-[r]->(n) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 AND n.mitre_id=$m2 RETURN type(r);") String findRelationshipByMitreId(@Param("m1") String mitreId1, @Param("m2") String mitreId2) throws Exception
      query relationship between two objects by id from database
      参数:
      mitreId1 - start node
      mitreId2 - end node
      返回:
      List of queried objects
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • createContainsRelationshipByMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m), (n) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 AND n.mitre_id=$m2 MERGE (m)-[r:contains]->(n) MERGE (n)-[re:in]->(m);") void createContainsRelationshipByMitreId(@Param("m1") String mitreId1, @Param("m2") String mitreId2) throws Exception
      create relationship 'contains' between two objects by id into database
      参数:
      mitreId1 - start node
      mitreId2 - end node
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • createInRelationshipByMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m), (n) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 AND n.mitre_id=$m2 MERGE (m)-[r:in]->(n) MERGE (n)-[re:contains]->(m);") void createInRelationshipByMitreId(@Param("m1") String mitreId1, @Param("m2") String mitreId2) throws Exception
      create relationship 'in' between two objects by id into database
      参数:
      mitreId1 - start node
      mitreId2 - end node
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • createUsesRelationshipByMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m), (n) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 AND n.mitre_id=$m2 MERGE (m)-[r:uses]->(n) MERGE (n)-[re:`is used by`]->(m);") void createUsesRelationshipByMitreId(@Param("m1") String mitreId1, @Param("m2") String mitreId2) throws Exception
      create relationship 'uses' between two objects by id into database
      参数:
      mitreId1 - start node
      mitreId2 - end node
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • createUsedByRelationshipByMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m), (n) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 AND n.mitre_id=$m2 MERGE (m)-[r:`is used by`]->(n) MERGE (n)-[re:`uses`]->(m);") void createUsedByRelationshipByMitreId(@Param("m1") String mitreId1, @Param("m2") String mitreId2) throws Exception
      create relationship 'is used by' between two objects by id into database
      参数:
      mitreId1 - start node
      mitreId2 - end node
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • deleteByMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 DELETE m;") void deleteByMitreId(@Param("m1") String mitreId) throws Exception
      delete an object by id from database
      参数:
      mitreId - id
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • deleteRelationships

      @Query("MATCH (m)-[r]->(n), (n)-[re]->(m) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 DELETE r, re;") void deleteRelationships(@Param("m1") String mitreId) throws Exception
      delete all relationships of an object by id from database
      参数:
      mitreId - id
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails

    • deleteRelationshipByStartNodeMitreId

      @Query("MATCH (m)-[r]->(n), (n)-[re]->(m) WHERE m.mitre_id=$m1 AND n.mitre_id=$m2 DELETE r, re;") void deleteRelationshipByStartNodeMitreId(@Param("m1") String mitreId1, @Param("m2") String mitreId2) throws Exception
      delete relationship between two objects by id from database
      参数:
      mitreId1 - start node
      mitreId2 - end node
      抛出:
      Exception - if fails
